    • Field Detail

      • TERM_TYPE

        public static final java.lang.String TERM_TYPE
        Base class for SSH Shell objects. Provides methods to set up and close an SSH session and shell. Provides send and expect commands, abstracting away the underlying stdin and stdout streams.
        See Also:

        public boolean expect(java.lang.String match)
        Expect command that uses default timeout.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if match found, false if timeout occurred.

      • expect

        public boolean expect(java.lang.String match,
             long timeout)
        Expect command attempts to match a string from the outgoing response of the shell.
        Parameters:
        match - String to find in the response from the shell.
        timeout - Milliseconds to time out reading response from shell.
        Returns:
